additionalSections.title: Location
additionalSections.content: Barranco is Lima's most charming district, known for its colorful colonial architecture, vibrant art scene, and oceanfront location. The hotel is perfectly positioned to explore the area's museums, galleries, and renowned restaurants.

hotel-totem-madrid.headline: Modern design meets Spanish hospitality
hotel-totem-madrid.description: Hotel Totem brings a fresh perspective to Madrid's luxury hotel scene. Located in the upscale Salamanca neighborhood, this design-forward property combines sleek modern aesthetics with warm Spanish hospitality.
highlights: Stunning rooftop bar with city views
Prime Salamanca location near luxury shopping

default.description: Discover what makes this place special. From unique design elements to exceptional service, every detail has been carefully curated to create an unforgettable experience.
